title: Separate Enhance from Shuffle please
text: I love this app! The new UX design not so much. I loved the A/B testing of having the enhanced button separate from the shuffle button. Now that they are together I have to look at the queue for the ‚Äúenhance‚Äù suggested songs and can‚Äôt add them once they have played because once they have been played from the queue you can‚Äôt go back to it. Realistically I would had added them from when they were added to my playlist making it easy to add when I can‚Äôt (ex: while I‚Äôm driving). Also, the heart button makes a lot more sense than the plus button. As a person that has multiple playlists I don‚Äôt always add songs to my likes. Now with the plus I don‚Äôt know whether it‚Äôs added to a playlist or my likes or both? It‚Äôs confusing üò≠

title: So close to perfection‚Ä¶
text:
I whole heartedly hope you could just get this it shouldn‚Äôt be to much of a hassle. And if you could reply that would be great. I am a kid and I don‚Äôt really listen to podcasts. I wish there was a way to turn the recommended podcast off. There is to many podcasts that pop up that are Inappropriate that I am not aloud to listen to  and I don‚Äôt want to get in trouble for having them be recommended. please fix this!!! Everything else is great! Love the music aspect of it but please fix podcasts! If I could get some sort of response that would really be helpful. If there is already a way to turn it off I would love that. I hope you have a good day:) 

-The Twenty One Pilots, One Direction, NF, Billie Eilish, Kodaline, Conan Gray, AJR, Alec Benjamin, Niall Horan, Louis Tomlinson, Kygo, and Imagine Dragons fan.

title: I don't like the new changes.
text: I miss the old update. I used to be able to click on the song and it would play a sample of it. Now I would have to hear the whole song which is time consuming when I am just trying to make playlists. I also noticed when adding songs from my liked lists it does not tell me if i added that song already to one of my playlists so it makes me forget what new song I discovered that needs to be sorted into a playlists of mine. Please allow us to be able to still listen to samples of a song in a playlist instead of forcing us to listen to the entire playlist just to figure out if that one song is the one we want. And please bring back the update that showed us if our liked songs are in certain playlists of ours already. Thank you! Overall great app my favorite but those two features was realllly important to me.

title: New update‚Äôs a mess
text: The new update is aggravating.  I don‚Äôt usually use playlists honestly, I usually click the recently played artists I have down under the home tab and shuffle the music I save for that specific artist.  However, this update made that feature disappear as now when I click on any artists I follow it brings me to their main account page where the only way I can see my saved songs is by going to their various albums.  I don‚Äôt know why someone thought that was a good idea, as it‚Äôs really completely annoying and makes it so much more difficult to see the songs I saved for specific artists (by the way this is for mobile).  Please change it back to how it was, or at least make it an option to do so because the new UI is creating tons of inconveniences and complications.

title: Just stop this
text: Honestly, i dont know where to start, i just cant out it out, how bad this issue is, this review is for people who cant have premium, why must i have to listen to songs ALWAYS in shuffle, it just screws up the music taste, if it were to be in order, they could section off the music in their playlist, speaking of playing music, why must i have to wait so long to play songs? The most ads i have ever had was 7! Seriously?! In my last review i talked over this, but its apparent you never read them, but in case you do, i will write this! Another thing bad about the ad problem, why must i wait 30 seconds to skip an ad, only to get a whole bunch more! This is just picking on the people who wont give you money! This is so wrong and there needs to be a change to this, you gave us the opposite of what we asked for, we asked for less ads and you gave us more. To add on, why do you add on more songs we never knew of or never inew the genre of? Just let us listen to the songs WE WANT TO. Honestly, this is supposed to be a music app, total shame!

title: This won‚Äôt make a difference but..
text:
Premium user and have been one for years now...so if I‚Äôm paying monthly for this app, why are there ads in the middle of podcasts that already do ads for their shows? What‚Äôs the point of paying premium if I still have to listen to unwanted ads? That‚Äôs the main point of paying premium. 

(I‚Äôm not sure about androids) but on iPhone why is it that I have no choice but to stream video from a podcast unless I download/turn off option for video first? If I stream a podcast without downloading it, I have no choice but to play the video as well. I understand it‚Äôs a new feature for this app, but navigating podcasts on this app is just redundant and frustrating. Give us a quick scroll! 

Same for the music! Quick scroll! And why did you take the ‚Äúsongs‚Äù tab away? The new update just booted a lot of discovered artists I‚Äôll probably never find again now that it requires you to ‚Äúfollow‚Äù each one. Why are we trying to treat this like a one stop social media/streaming platform? Why does it take me to the artists profile whenever I tap on them in my ‚Äúartists‚Äù section? Extremely redundant.
 
Then to top it all off I had a couple of albums downloaded and then a few weeks later they‚Äôre just gone? The songs that made it into my ‚Äúon repeat‚Äù stayed downloaded, but the whole albums are just gone without putting in any input. I could go on and on..

 Maybe newer isn‚Äôt always better.

title: It's ok
text: Yes, this app is pretty good. But it's kinda irritating me, my brother won't hook me up to the family premium because it's to time consuming and takes a long time. Why do I have to go through an hour of my time just to put me on premium? It's also pretty annoying when I only have 6 skips per hour, what's the point of that?  And I just want to play one song, that's it but I have to listen to a whole nother album of songs I don't know. It makes me so frustrated. And I have this bug where I'll be listening to a song and it randomly closes out of the app completely. The adds are also out of hand. Why do I have to watch a "short" video to get only 40 minutes of uninterrupted listening? It's only a 5 star if you had premium. I'm just getting super annoyed with this app. I honestly have nothing good to say about it unless I had premium. But yeah the construction of the app was brilliant but the way you made it was not too bright

title: Awesome app,  but come on
text:
This is gonna sound very childish, but as a child (teenager) I don‚Äôt find that to be much of an insult. 

So, as I just mentioned, I am a teenager, so I don‚Äôt actually have a computer. This is a problem because I would like to make my playlists look more appealing to me, and the main way I would like to do that is by adding my own picture to the cover of my playlists. It wouldnt be that hard to incorporate an option to change the playlist cover into the editing lauyout, so why hasnt it been done yet? I understand that the change would have to be coded in and i understand that that is a task, but the design element of it isn‚Äôt so hard that it just cant be a part of the app. There is already an option to do this on desktop and its just confusing that it hasn‚Äôt been done on mobile. Anyways, hopefully you add this feature in the future, and also hopefully I don‚Äôt sound like I‚Äôm taking this way too seriously.

title: For me, no music streaming service stands out.
text: I think the most disappoint thing about this app, and any music streaming service, is the algorithm it uses to suggest music to you. From what I can tell, there‚Äôs no way to modify your preferences when creating stations or having it suggest music. For example, one my favorite artists have been making music for a while now, and their sound as changes a lot since they started. So, I might create a station with music that they put out on their new album, and then the station starts playing music similar to what they made in 2005. It‚Äôs disheartening when you are looking for new music similar to what an older artist is creating today. It would be refreshing to have the ability to narrow the algorithm to specific timeframes and remove artists or genres you don‚Äôt want to listen to.  Like for real, Sum 41‚Äôs new music is mostly medallic hardcore and metal and it‚Äôs playing Good Charlotte and The Offspring for crying out loud.

title: Where‚Äôs the ‚ÄúDownloaded‚Äù Folder???!
text:
I‚Äôve been waiting for the feature to come back update after update but the ‚ÄúDownloaded‚Äù folder still hasn‚Äôt come back yet.  I like to download new full albums and playlists before a long trip so I can listen to them all during the ride but it‚Äôs tedious to have to scroll through the entire album and playlist lists just to find the ones that I downloaded.  It would be a lot easier to just have the downloaded folder back so I can see all the ones I had downloaded in one place.

Also, it would be nice to have that right swipe delete feature when it comes to editing playlists.  It think it would be a lot easier to do that to delete songs from a playlist instead of having to click the edit button then click on those red circles and then press delete every time I wanted to edit a playlist.

title: Sure
text: I don‚Äôt think the user interface is the most intuitive. (Since when does ‚Äúliking‚Äù or ‚Äúhearting‚Äù something grant you access to it?) The ‚Äúshuffle‚Äù ain‚Äôt random, either. (Listen to a 150+ song playlist on two different days and the first five songs play in the exact same order each time?) Their algorithm could use some work. Like radio stations, I assume they only have rights to play content in accordance with the specific buyer-distributor agreement for the content, but Jaysus. The ads are disorienting, too, but that‚Äôs not something I can really fault them for. They gotta make money somehow, or they can‚Äôt pay artists. (I just hope they‚Äôre not ripping artists off. I hope they pay what they genuinely think is fair for the content and not just the cheapest offer they can get away with.) It‚Äôs still the only service I know of that lets friends collaborate to build a playlist.

title: Beautiful App
text:
Ok so, I absolutely love this app, I have been here for about 4 years now, and seriously I totally totally love the layout, the look, everything. I also love the yearly wraps, like looking back to see what I listened to and also to see how much was epic! Like 63,000 minutes this year, and it‚Äôll be more next year believe me.

 However, if in a different update, could it be possible to have a checklist for your playlists you add to?? It‚Äôs just a hassle to have to click ‚ÄúAdd to playlist‚Äù 3-5 times depending on where I want a song. It‚Äôs perfect how it is right now, but that would be nice. And also having the volume bar be to the side or top would be nice unless I guess with the new update for iPhone at least the volume is on the side, but something like Instagram or YouTube‚Äôs volume bar just being very minimal would be pretty cool.

title: Only + is the database size, otherwise pretty pathetic
text: + huge database + lets me use it for free with minor ads. Sadly the option to see a longer ad to get 30 mins nonstop music doesn‚Äôt exist anymore - can‚Äôt pick a song in the app, shuffle only. - us local ads are extremely annoying and much louder than the general volume. Seriously it‚Äôs not that bad for other regions, therefore deserves all the hate. - if you are a millenial like myself you don‚Äôt the get to enjoy student pricing at 50% off, or a family discount. I get to pay the full premium, which is not bargain at all. Also very different pricing based on the region‚Ä¶ - ‚Ä¶travel lock issues. I have to use vpn to log in and sometimes it just doesn‚Äôt let me in through the phone until I‚Äôm on wifi. Are they supporting peasantry, not letting me use what I paid for because I dare to hang outside my base address for over 2 (two) weeks? Very stupid. Vpn solves that in a click, but still so dumb, and wrong.

title: Forcing Music
text:
I have been using the free version for years now, but recently the app has continuously tried to force music, well outside of my normal genres upon me.
I have noticed more and more commercials, even more than listening to the radio, but I‚Äôm willing to endure it for the ability to hear MY playlist.
I understand that after running through my playlist, I will hear music based upon my selections in my playlist, but I have well over 300 songs in my playlist and for the past few months I am having to close my playlist, open a new one and then returning to my original playlist, after just a few songs. I have to do this every 4-5 songs!!
I‚Äôve already begun using other music streaming apps and will likely be deleting this app because of it.
I would be okay with it occasionally throwing in new music within my preferred genres but that‚Äôs NOT what it is doing. I‚Äôm a metal fan and throwing in pop music or country, which is nowhere in any of my playlist is completely insane

title: App is good, heads up for free users
text: As mentioned, the app is good. Semi wonderful interface and easy to use. However, there are some questionable choices to get you to use premium. You aren‚Äôt allowed to fully play specific songs in your playlist, and you are only allowed 6 song skips an hour. This is a pain for me since my song playlists are long the only way to hear the specific song I want is to shuffle enough times to hope it‚Äôll run. If I search the song up, it will find a playlist with the song in it. Not, the actual song I want to listen to. Again, the app itself is good and there‚Äôs lots of music choices to choose from. But as someone who sometimes wants to listen to a specific song and have long playlists, this can be and is easily a pain to deal with. I don‚Äôt believe anyone should have to pay to find something they could find for free elsewhere

title: I used to love this app...
text: But now?  Not so much.  The number of ads CB I‚Äôm forced to watch/listen too has gotten ridiculous.   I just had to sit through a total of 7 ads and I‚Äôve only listened to 3 songs.  Does it not keep track of when and how many ads it‚Äôs played?  I was forced to watch a 30 second ad upon logging in, then the same ad after listening to one song PLUS another two 15 second ones. Then after ùë°‚Ñéùëéùë° song finally played, the 15 second ad telling me if I listen to a 30 second ad I‚Äôll get thirty minutes of uninterrupted music played, which I didn‚Äôt click because I‚Äôd already listened to enough ads, the ad played anyway.   Finally a song played but jokes on me, afterwards the click for 30 minutes of uninterrupted music ad played then another ad started and I GAVE UP.   And yes, I updated.  Each update has gotten progressively worse with ads.  I no longer enjoy using this app, which is sad because I found great new (to me) music while using it.  Now all I find are ads.

title: One awful glitch (It's fixed now!)
text:
One of the recent updates must‚Äôve broken the radio feature on songs, albums, and playlists. They do work almost as intended if you open a radio and play it on shuffle (which *will* play random songs on shuffle, but *won‚Äôt* even play the songs shown on the list?), but if you select one of the songs manually, it won‚Äôt play and the buttons for switching over to the previous/next song will be greyed out. Other times, clicking on songs or trying to play the radio just won‚Äôt do anything. Songs featured on radios sometimes get switched out or shuffled, too. It‚Äôs an all around bad time. I was hoping that the update pushed today would fix it, but no dice. 

 Edit: The problem has been fixed!

title: ‚ÄúShuffle‚Äù is broken
text:
I‚Äôve never been too bothered by adds or the lack of premium, and the app is still great to use, but there has been a problem over the last couple of days. 
Lately I‚Äôve been obsessed over one of my favorite albums from a great creator, and I‚Äôve been putting the one album on shuffle. The problem is, it‚Äôs started to lay songs that have nothing to do with either the artist nor the album itself. I‚Äôm getting really irritated  since even shuffling artists, playlists, and albums of other kinds are starting to play and rotate songs that aren‚Äôt even a part of and/or related to that playlist, album, or artist.
Please please PLEASE can this get fixed? I really hope this is just some glitch, because I don‚Äôt care how many adds I have to see a day without premium, as long as I can actually SHUFFLE. WHAT. I. LIKE. 
Other than that, great app to listen to music on.

title: Can‚Äôt do anything without premium
text: I like this app. It‚Äôs alright but you can‚Äôt do anything without premium. You get 6 skips an hour and even with those I have to waste them all on song that aren‚Äôt even in my playlist. I make a playlist and now there‚Äôs all these ‚Äúrecommended songs‚Äù that I don‚Äôt even like. Bot my taste at all and I‚Äôve tried to turn it off but I can‚Äôt. Not without premium. I‚Äôm mainly frustrated because of this reason. Otherwise it‚Äôs like a 7/10 for me. I like YTM better because you can listen to ur music in order, make playlists without all these crap songs in the middle, and they have a bigger library of small creators and remixes. The one thing abt YTM is the adds and that‚Äôs it. I just want to listen to the music that I PUT in my playlist and not all these songs in the middle. At least can you make it so you can turn this off, it would be very appreciated.

title: Really great app, one small thing would suggest to add
text: I love the app and so does my family, we have a family plan which is a super great deal for us, we can listen to and download our songs as we please, and it is super easy to use. The quality is amazing and the selection of music is wonderful. However one thing that would make it so much better is if we could arrange songs in our liked songs the same way you can arrange them in playlists. It is really a drag that you can‚Äôt drag and move songs in order as you like in your liked songs, which is really the only ‚Äúplaylist‚Äù I, and probably many others listen to. It would be a really useful addition, and a simple one too that would make the app much better. Other than that, great app, and i definitely prefer over any others.

title: Organization
text:
Really good app and simple but it doesn‚Äôt sort the music by artist and songs it does artist but you can‚Äôt see the songs till you click on it or it sorts it by what you downloaded first or alphabetical it‚Äôs just frustrating at times when you can‚Äôt remember a song name and you know part of it or have an idea and spend 30 min looking for 1 song. At least for me but it‚Äôs good doesn‚Äôt have all the music but a large chunk of music that is with premium with out it it‚Äôs literally pandora or iHeartRadio unless they do that now also if you can download and listen to music on something else like that don‚Äôt get it like what‚Äôs the point of having so many of the same thing with different names
But still have to pay 5 different people that makes the same thing but says is different.

title: Stop ‚Äúimproving‚Äù
text:
Not sure if anyone else has seen this new update but I am not a fan. The library page has been completely switched up, in an uncomfortable way I can‚Äôt explain. There‚Äôs no longer any stations on that page, I can‚Äôt see what I‚Äôve recently listened to, it‚Äôs all out of wack. Not only that, but nothing is loading, and it‚Äôs not even just my internet connection or my data. My home page is completely empty and anytime I try and search for anything, once I click on what I‚Äôm looking for, everything is blank. Please stop updating and ‚Äúimproving‚Äù this app. I‚Äôve always loved it but with these past few updates I‚Äôve become more uncomfortable and upset with it after all the work I‚Äôve put into making my playlists
The library page is the only thing that‚Äôs changed and it‚Äôs the most annoying by far. I can‚Äôt see how many songs I have in each playlist, and my ‚Äúsaved songs‚Äù used to not be in a playlist, which I happened to enjoy them very much being in their own little area. All around disappointing.

title: Great app, but one thing should change.
text: Love the app, I‚Äôve used it for years and recommend it to everyone. However, one thing I wish they would change is the song cap to above 10,000 songs. I listen to a wide variety of music therefore have a lot saved to my library, but I‚Äôve reached the point now where I can no longer ‚ÄúSave‚Äù an album or song. Whenever I want to do so I have to go into my library and try and find something I wouldn‚Äôt mind deleting so I can save what I want to save. This is very disheartening because I saved those albums/songs for a reason (I like them...duh) and don‚Äôt want to delete any of them. I just don‚Äôt get how a streaming app can put a cap on how much you can save, especially since you‚Äôre not downloading them directly to your phone. Hopefully that will change soon.

title: Highly addictive.
text: Even though I just got the app yesterday, I absolutely love it. Yes, of course there are advertisements, however they are only about every forty minutes to an hour. Unlike competitors (which I have tried in the past) you don‚Äôt need to pay to listen to songs and the free version is actually really nice. As someone who has always listened to less popular artists, when I switched I wanted to make sure I could still listen to their music, and I still can. There‚Äôs a huge range of podcasts and music and quite literally anything for anyone. The paid version also seems nice, as you can download songs down and not have to worry about any advertisements playing. Overall, I would definitely recommend this to friends.

title: used to be good
text: Let‚Äôs get to the point. The update was awful. Sometimes it will randomly stop playing. I have to stop what I‚Äôm doing and open the app back up to resume my song. I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs a problem with my Bluetooth connection because shutting off and reconnecting my headphones or other Bluetooth devices doesn‚Äôt do anything. This only started happening after the update. Another thing? No more reordering your queue. This was a feature I used a lot. Adding a podcast to queue specifically after like 5 songs, rearranging my playlists because shuffle is a scam. I liked this feature, and I actually wanted there to be a way to add multiple playlists to queue and shuffle them all together. Instead I got this taken way entirely.    I know I sound very annoying, but these two problems are driving me insane. I pay for this app, and I was honestly disappointed.

title: Built in radio feature is repetitive
text:
I use the app on a very regular basis, love the operating system, and the utility of it. Most of the time it‚Äôs incredibly convenient to just leave playing. The system for the ‚Äúradio based on‚Äù used to be really good, it would recommend songs similar to whatever was playing before. Now it only plays the same tracks on repeat no matter what I was listening to before. It‚Äôs frustrating how similar the playback is too, it‚Äôs playing an almost identical set every time, not even songs I would usually listen to. Every time one comes on I think ‚ÄúOh the playlist is over now, guess I should go change it‚Äù and it‚Äôs so repetitive. Please fix this so I‚Äôm not hearing the same three tracks after any playlist is over. This review is written entirely for the development team. For users: Best streaming software on the market, 5 out of 5 stars.

I have screenshots of the constant re occurring tracks, some of them are songs I‚Äôve liked, but obviously they are overplayed now.

title: Great app; wish new home was customizable
text:

(It‚Äôs weird because ones an artist and ones a podcast I haven‚Äôt listened to in 2 weeks.)
I read the 6 things are supposed to update, mine have not changed since the update.
I want to be able to CHOOSE what is pinned in which spot, like organizing apps on my phone. Please adjust this to be truly customizable rather than approximately customized.

title: Love it
text:
I love using it. I have about 10 playlists on here. You can find so many new different artists and bands that you will love. I found my favorite band by listening to one of my playlists till the end, then the radio based on my playlist turned on. I love this feature. Also, I love how I can listen offline to my favorite podcasts by downloading them. You can add albums to your library to listen to just the album. I can also add artists to my ‚Äú favorites‚Äù (I don‚Äôt know what it‚Äôs actually called). 

I do not have premium, but it is not a necessity to have. It will just prevent adds. It does cost money to get premium, that‚Äôs why I‚Äôm saying that it is not needed. It does help tho for uninterrupted listening.

Anyway, if you made it to the end of my crazy long review, I highly recommend this app. Also, have an AMAZING day!

title: Probably the Worst Update So Far
text: Yet again, the most recent update has removed functionalities of the app that I used more than anything else, namely the recently played section. I almost never listen to or make playlists which makes it kind of infuriating that it's now the center point of the music and I get absolutely no choice to customize this. Additionally, the artist section that I also primarily used is all sorts of messed up and I almost always have to search for any artists I want even if I've had their entire discography downloaded and played heavily for years. The only reason this isn't a 1 star is because I actually like what was done with the podcast section to make it more prominent and easier to use, but otherwise the music section should more or less go back to how it was.

title: Well...
text: it‚Äôs great for finding music and artists and all of that, but you can‚Äôt ‚Äúfilter‚Äù your albums or ‚Äúorganize‚Äù them unless you‚Äôre a premium member. which i find stupid because it should automatically be put in alphabetical order by the song or by the artist or something, but it stays in the order you add the songs, which i find dumb. and you can‚Äôt ‚Äúsearch‚Äù for individual songs in your playlist either unless you‚Äôre premium. and it lets you add the same song to a playlist if it‚Äôs from a different album, so basically you have duplicate songs. this goes back to the search thing, if i can‚Äôt search up the song and i want to remove the song i would have to scroll through my 700 song playlist to just find one of them, and i wouldn‚Äôt even know there was a duplicate unless they were organized by the artists or alphabetically where the duplicate songs were next to each other.

title: listen to your users already!!
text: your app description says you‚Äôre always making updates & improvements, but as a user for several years, the entire interface & experience has only gotten worse. people have given you feedback for so long about what we‚Äôd like to see improve & the features we‚Äôd like to see brought back/implemented - and seriously guys, it‚Äôs 2020!! and this app is starting to feel so outdated. listen to your users, some of our suggestions would be so simple to implement, like allowing us to change our profile photos/album photos from our phones, letting us see what our friends are listening to from our phones, making it easier to remove a song from a playlist without having to go back into the playlist and scroll until it‚Äôs found, letting us BLOCK someone (i‚Äôve been harassed on this app before by someone following me on SEVERAL different accounts). PLEASE. do SOMETHING!! make it more fun & easier to navigate. add new features! we‚Äôre begging!

title: Problems
text: Sooooo i love this app but I gave the review two cuz of the problems I have and others have. First of all the ads, I,HATE,THEM. I mean why do you have ads if no one wants them, and you only get 6 skips per hour I mean that‚Äôs CRAZY. Second of all the music itself, I hate that it automatically adds related music I mean I just want to listen to my music alone no other ‚Äúrelated‚Äù music. Third of all I want to be able to have unlimited skips without paying for it, like if I wanna skip a song I don‚Äôt want to listen to at the time I just wanna be able to skip it. plz fix these issues and I will make a better review. From No Olvidare Tus Pecados Ps I don‚Äôt have this problem on Xbox except the ads, again fix this problem. PSs. My nickname is Spanish for ‚ÄúI won‚Äôt forget your sins‚Äù

title: Shuffle
text: I‚Äôve noticed the formulaic way the playlist shuffled the songs. I always jump from playlist to playlist and it always reshuffles which makes sense, but I‚Äôve noticed the same 10 songs playing first every time I go to shuffle my playlist. I literally missing out on tons of other songs when I reshuffle the playlist without having to sit through the entire thing and listen to every song the reshuffle misses. I always thought that was just a glitch but then I did a little experiment. Every time I shuffle a playlist, it plays the songs in order but shuffles then in sections. I always loved the unpredictability of shuffle feature but I guess I would have to kiss that goodbye. It is also very obvious when I reshuffle the playlist and the same song plays first. Like what‚Äôs the point of having a shuffle feature if you k ow what song is coming next.

title: I love this app, one complaint though. :(
text: I love this app and have been using it for years now. However, I am disappointed I can‚Äôt add a song or episode multiple times to a playlist. I‚Äôm pretty sure you were able to before at the cost of a pop up asking you to confirm adding that song or episode to the playlist a second (3rd,4th, etc) time. I would like to have the ability to be able to add a any song or episode to a playlist as many times as I‚Äôd like. Especially with running playlists bc I really like to listen to songs multiple times but you can‚Äôt exactly do that with episodes, I don‚Äôt think. Which makes it difficult because one of my favorites is on an episode, but I can‚Äôt replay it as many times as I‚Äôd like. So would it be possible to add that feature back with a new update?

title: It is far from what it was when I first started using the app
text: I miss when the app had minimized adds and didn‚Äôt have like 15 adds that take forever to play(slightly exaggerated) after almost every song, it‚Äôs like music apps (Amazon,Spotify,apple, etc.) worry a lot more about the money rather than the people, using their app with a free subscription having a good experience and then wanting to support the app with a subscription. I miss the old app, and just want to listen to music without hearing the same exact adds for the 100th time and not get adds promoting playlists that are FAAAR from my music taste, at least if your gonna have as many adds as you do at least make them personalized to that specific person and their music taste. If the app (or any other app) keeps going the money hungry route I‚Äôm not sure I‚Äôm going to use keep using ANY music app and just start purchasing my music so I at least own it after downloading.

title: It was good but‚Ä¶
text:
I love the app honestly, o have it on both of my devices but I have a phew problems on my phone

When I want to search a specific song I get all these random songs that I don‚Äôt want to listen to, which is highly frustrating for me. Another problem is only 6 skips per hour, It‚Äôs ridiculous how I have to wait until my time has past listening to the songs suggested that I don‚Äôt want to listen to and buy. Another problem along with that is I‚Äôm not able to skip throughout the song??? How does that makes sense? Say you want your friend to hear a specific part of a song, so why have to hear the whole song when you just want to hear that one part? As a school student when I‚Äôm studying and listening to music and hear something I don‚Äôt want and have no skips left and can‚Äôt skip throughout the song it gets annoying real quick.

title: Great Media other than that it‚Äôs a less than stellar app
text: I don‚Äôt usually write reviews but this app infuriates me do much‚Ä¶how could i not write one üò≠. But anyways, this app started off great I was a big fan of it especially last year. But this year you guys really messed up this app. Every two songs I get an ad, I can‚Äôt even look at other peoples playlist or custom playlists because of your new update. Like seriously?! Not to mention free users can‚Äôt even pick their own music, I feel like it‚Äôs the least you guys could give us and idk let us look at other playlists hello?! This app became a quick cash grab and now you‚Äôve made this app almost unusable. And you guys also took away song previews like that was making you guys lose any money üòí. I do however absolutely love the aesthetic of this app and your guys‚Äô variety of media, but if you guys don‚Äôt fix the functionality of this app for the people who can‚Äôt pay for premium you‚Äôre going to lose so many other users other than myself.

title: Could be better
text: Songs pause for no reason. Downloaded songs won‚Äôt play away from wi-fi, parts of playlists or albums are greyed out, even when I hit the ‚Äúdownloaded‚Äù tab in my library. The songs reappear when I am near wi-fi again but this defeats the purpose. Reinstalling the app will fix for a few weeks then it will start again. Offline songs were the whole reason I went premium. If you make a playlist while you‚Äôre offline it will work great, even works for a few hours when you are around wi-fi again, then it will delete the playlist, even if you‚Äôre in the middle of playing said playlist. I contacted tech on this one and they said you technically can‚Äôt make playlists offline, and that it was strange it would even let me create one at all (it let me do everything but edit the playlist picture). Kinda not worth it anymore.

title: More freedom for non-premium
text: I‚Äôve had this app for a while now and have really enjoyed it but I wish I had a little more freedom. Once I make my own playlist and all of my songs are over, ‚Äúadded‚Äù songs start to play. The added songs don‚Äôt even match the genre of my playlist and some are even inappropriate‚Ä¶.but I can‚Äôt skip them until another hour. After this I will go to another playlist and then return to the first one but the song is still playing so I can‚Äôt use the playlist. Can you loop songs instead of shuffling them? If so how do I change the mode? I also use this app for when I teach dance and a commercial for a horror film  came on (with lots of screaming) and scared a younger student. Could you please keep the ads kid friendly. It wasn‚Äôt scary for me but is to kindergarteners. I don‚Äôt want to discourage in any way but these changes would make a huge impact.

title: A few problems‚Ä¶
text: I love the app, it‚Äôs great and it has an amazing listening experience, but when you get your ‚Äú30 minutes of ad free music‚Äù it‚Äôs more like 10 minutes. Also the app crashes at random times, even when it doesn‚Äôt need an update. When you play it again the song goes back like 30 seconds. The app adds songs to your playlist and you don‚Äôt have the option to turn that off. Only getting 7 skips an hour is stupid because I shouldn‚Äôt have to listen to a song I don‚Äôt want to listen to on my own playlist. The ads. Sometimes I have to listen to 3 30 second ads. I understand that you need to have advertisements to make money, the it‚Äôs kinda excessive. Overall it‚Äôs a great app. I just think it need some improvement.

title: Poor
text: Lags whenever opening app takes awhile to load any screen, playback is horrible anytime there‚Äôs an ad, like 75% of the time app either stops podcast and kicks me out of app completely, or starts playing another podcast episode. Then when trying to start from where I left off because kicked me out I can‚Äôt because app doesn‚Äôt recognize anything and thinks I played full episode so I have to remember or find spot in podcast where it kicked me out because ad wouldn‚Äôt play.  App does not automatically download any new podcast episodes unless there‚Äôs setting I don‚Äôt know about. Only podcast I listen to on here is joe Rogan experience. Apple podcast app and music app runs so much smoother. If I didn‚Äôt have these issues consistently EVERY DAY at least 2-3 times then maybe I‚Äôd consider paying for better version but app has a long way to go in my opinion and if rogan wasn‚Äôt here I would not even Be listening or using all at all.

title: Good, but can get better
text:
I have a only 1 suggestion for the app. First of all, I just want to get out of the way that this app is absolutely remarkable. It‚Äôs magnificent. I will never use any other music platform. The fact that I only have one suggestion is me saying how good it is. I totally recommend it.
Here is my suggestion:
You should actually give us 30 minutes of ‚Äúuninterrupted music‚Äù when you say you will. I got that add, then it made me watch a video, then played one song. Then it did it after that. Song. That is a straight up lie. I don‚Äôt know if those ads are randomized or not. If they are, can you make it how it waits 30 minutes until playing that ad and any other ad please?
Otherwise, this app is to amazing to describe in words.
10/5 stars in my eyes. :D

title: Love this app, few complaints.
text:
I love this app, just a few complaints. First of all, I don‚Äôt like how it adds songs to a playlist I made, and I barely even know them. Adding onto that, I don‚Äôt like how it only allows 6 skips per hour, because after I skip through the songs the add on I have no skips left. They also make it so you can‚Äôt skip back to a song. Sometimes I press skip by accident and then I can‚Äôt go back. Also, they say watch this video for 30 minutes of uninterrupted music. It‚Äôs more like 20 for me. Also, the adds are constantly the same thing, even after I‚Äôve put a bad review on them. One last thing. I don‚Äôt know if this is my phone itself or it is the app, but after about an hour of music it randomly stops playing. 

Over all this app if fantastic, but it would make it better if they changed the things I just listed.

title: So many ads I expect them more often then music
text:
I had premium for years on and off. I‚Äôve switched to the free version since covid.... 
It‚Äôs literally unbelievable how many ads there are now. I hate this app now. There used to be a set algorithm where you got so and so amount of skips (6) and 30 minutes of ad-free music. Now they changed their algorithm so it‚Äôs different depending on what playlist you‚Äôre listening to. I just listened to 1 song after listening to a FEW MINUTES of ads and then skipped like 5 songs bc I didn‚Äôt like the playlist I had going and I had to listen to MORE ADS. When those were done I changed the playlist to my liked songs and I GOT MORE ADS FOR ‚Äú30 minutes of uninterrupted listening‚Äù- that‚Äôs a rarity now. Lately they‚Äôve been giving ads with no guaranteed amount of time after it that you get ad-free listening. 

There are a lot of good things but right now I can‚Äôt see past all the ads I‚Äôm being bombarded with. I‚Äôve literally gotten to the point where I expect ads to play next before I expect music to play.

title: üëçüèªü§≠
text: This app is great!!! I‚Äôve had it for about maybe 2 years and i just got premium about a year ago and it works amazing! The only 2 problems I have is the recommended songs I listen to my playlist and after 5 songs a random song comes on and I have no idea what it is and it‚Äôs annoying when I go to sleep with music on. And also some of my downloaded playlists and my liked songs won‚Äôt play offline and it‚Äôs annoying because your listening to ur playlist like for example me listening to my likes playlist while camping with no service and all the sudden none of my songs are playing except some and so I have to click on another song and some of the songs that aren‚Äôt playing that are downloaded are my favorites and it‚Äôs very irritating. Those are my only complaints to this app but overall it‚Äôs a good app for music!!!

title: Sorry but I have to unsubscribe
text: The last few updates have just been annoying to me. Small tweaks make a big difference to users. I‚Äôve been a customer for years and now I‚Äôm afraid we must part ways. One day a song I added to my playlist is there the next it‚Äôs gone or unplayable. It‚Äôs just not an attractive to me anymore. Idk why it has to be so difficult to organize/personalize your playlists. I always forget where to find it. Idk why you hide the search bar in a playlist, I always forget it‚Äôs there lol. I don‚Äôt like how I can‚Äôt change the playlist photo through mobile app because I don‚Äôt have a computer or laptop ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è. So I have this playlist with new songs but the cover is of the first four songs I added to the playlist years ago. Nobody is going to add that playlist or listen to it lol. Anyways I‚Äôm currently a free agent in the music streaming market so shoot me your suggestions if any users read this lol.
